item.title: First Post
item.description: As I have officially decided to create a blog, I am looking to share some of my ideas with the world. This involves topics about music, philosophy, computer science and software engineering. There is a lot to learn, so let us get started.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a recent graduate from the university of St Andrews where I studied Artificial Intelligence. From the degree I learnt a lot about traditional AI systems which involves search, logic as well as probability. I also learnt a lot about machine learning and deep learning architectures which include convolutional, recurrent and generative adversarial neural networks. I also picked up a course in Distributed and Data intensive Systems where I convered topics that has to do with several operating and distributed architectures.
